title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should have the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Retrieve datetime values from the table. 
2. Display the values in both a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 
3. Observe the format of the datetime values in both items.
